raw: Access to production systems shall be limited to authorized personnel based on least privilege.
note: No invented cadence like quarterly access reviews.

raw: All laptops used for Company work must have full-disk encryption enabled.
note: No invented tools/vendors/standards.

raw: The Company shall maintain an incident response plan and document actions taken during security incidents.

raw: User access shall be reviewed quarterly by the Security team.

raw: Customer support tickets containing personal information must be handled confidentially and only shared with those who need it to resolve the ticket.
